author: gokturk
msg: *Fix to updateCsnIndex which was leaving the old Csn in place because it was removing the tuple which is keyed to new Csn value.

author: gmazza
msg: Removed extra blurb from Fediz README.

author: gokturk
msg: * Removed the 'top' check on objectclass index at removals as a cleanup mechanism when old partition files are used directly.
* lookup method is fixed for this scenario:
LookupContext has attributeIds containing ALL_OPERATIONAL and couple of user attributes. Before then, code was discarding the all user attributes completely on this scenario.

author: gokturk
msg: * Fix for objectclass index to don't contain "top" as a key which will bloat the index unnecessarly since it's present on every entry. This was documented but didn't applied in the code.
